fgeo.tool
  • Functions Index
  • News
  • fgeo

Reference version 0.0.0.9002

Add columns to dataframes

add_status_tree

Define the status of a tree based on the status of its stems.

add_subquad

Add a quadrat variable to a dataframe based based on qx and qy coordinates.

add_var add_lxly add_qxqy add_index add_col_row add_hectindex add_quad add_col_row2

Add columns to a dataframe.

Filter dataframes

filter_status stem_not_dead tree_not_dead

Filter a (fgeo) dataframe by the status of each stem or tree.

discard_dead_twice

Remove trees found dead in both the last and previous last censuses.

top

Filter a data set by matching n values from the head (or tail) of a variable.

Manipulate vectors

str_suffix_match

Suffix a strings where a vector exactly matches one specific string.

Manipulate dataframes

restructure_elev

If necessary, pull elevation data and rename x and y to gx and gy.

collapse_censusid

Collapse the values of CensusID.

recode_subquad

Recode subquadrat labels.

Miscellaneous for users

reexports

Objects exported from other packages

Miscellaneous for developers

These functions mainly target developers

check_crucial_names

Check if an object contains specific names.

check_unique check_unique_vector

Report if a vector or a variable of a dataframe is duplicated.

exists_in_pkg

Test if an object exists in the namespace of a package.

fgeo_package_deps

Find fgeo packages that depend on a given package.

nms_restore_newvar

Restore the names of a dataframe to which a new variable has been added.

nms_lowercase nms_restore

Lower and restore names.

nms_has_any nms_detect nms_extract_all nms_extract1

Functions to detect and extract names.

guess_plotdim

Guess plot dimensions.
